[Here are the calcs/workup for the DNase treatment](https://spreadsheets.google.com/ccc?key=0AmS_90rPaQMzdFNmTGk3Z2ZkTFJ1NHdjSUtjS0RMREE&hl=en). This used previously untreated RNA.
